title: Preserve actor-isolation metadata across module verification and diagnose isolation metadata mismatch
feature: actor isolation metadata preservation across module boundaries

diagnostics.message: compiled module metadata does not match emitted textual interface

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: actor-isolated declarations preserve actor-binding metadata for importer hop and await requirements
objc_nonisolated markers are preserved as explicit isolation metadata in emitted module and interface artifacts
strict verification reports isolation metadata mismatch as an interface-verification error

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized emission preserves actor-isolation and nonisolated metadata fields used by importers
optimization does not erase required isolation metadata from module/interface artifacts
strict isolation metadata mismatch diagnostics remain equivalent to -O0 under verification

abi_field_stability.stability_property: importers retain actor-isolation metadata needed to enforce cross-actor await and hop rules
nonisolated boundary semantics remain explicitly encoded for cross-module import and verification
